DOC.brief_summary: The investigators believe DCAMKL-1 is a stem cell tumor marker and is elevated in patients with pancreatic cancer. The investigators would like to analyze its expression pre and post treatment, to gauge the correlation between current pancreatic cancer therapies and the expression of DCAMKL-1
DOC.brief_title: Serum DCAMKL1 Pre and Post Treatment in Patients With Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: pancreatic cancer age < 18, history of other types of cancer
